title: SOLIDSILVER - Sterling Silver Snake Textured Endless Infinity Hoop Earrings 10-60mm
features: PURE POLISHED SILVER - Genuine 925 sterling silver shines and glitters with incredible brilliance. SOLIDSILVER's snake textured endless silver hoop earrings have a sleek closing clasp that disappears inside the hoop to create a gorgeous seamless hoop design that will stay secure and comfortable all day long.

PREMIUM COMFORT – Snake textureed endless hoops are also called sleeper hoops because the clasp is so strong you can wear your earrings to sleep and keep them in for weeks on end without discomfort, irritation or pinching. Our genuine sterling silver construction is durable and nickel free.

THE PERFECT SIZE & COLOR – We offer a variety of hoop sizes from 10mm – 60mm in circle or in 15mm - 30mm oval shaped hoops so that you can choose the perfect shape that matches your personal style and daily outfits. Match SOLIDSILVER hoop earrings with our exclusive bracelets, pendants, necklaces, rings and other earring choices.

HIGH QUALITY GIFT - Show her you care with a lightweight and comfortable pair of timeless hoop earrings that pairs with all sorts of outfits and personal styles. Our SOLIDSILVER jewelry pieces make great gifts for Mother’s Day, birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, graduations and Valentine's Day.

SOLIDSILVER COMMITMENT - Here at SOLIDSILVER we believe in bringing our loyal customers the best sterling silver jewelry pieces at affordable everyday prices. We offer silver bracelets, earrings, necklaces, bangles, rings and more! Join thousands of delighted customers...Click Add-to-Cart Today!
description: Are you searching for the perfect pair of genuine 925 sterling silver earrings?
Enjoy the comfort, color and shine of our premium sterling silver snake textured circle or oval endless infinity hoop earrings.
Each earring is made to look elegant and adorable with all clothing styles and gold jewelry pairings.

These textured endless hoop earrings are a ideal gift to your loved one or celebrate your personal style. It is a beautiful piece that complements your personal style with this jewelry for any special occasion like Mothers-day, Friendship, Engagement, Valentines-day, Anniversary, Birthday, Party, Prom and Christmas.
Check out our entire catalog of premier high quality jewelry pieces in modern styles and classic timeless designs.
Pair earrings with bracelets, pendants, necklaces and rings for perfectly coordinated outfits and looks.
If you’re searching for premium 14K gold jewelry, then please check out our sister company SOLIDGOLD and their exclusive designs.
Note: Snake textured infinity endless hoops earrings not recommended for children under 12.
Join thousands of happy customers...Click Add-to-Cart and order your sterling silver snake textured infinity endless hoop earrings Today!
